title: Consumer preference : fiction versus non-fiction books in England 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 4 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Mixture of both and lowest at Response Neither.
The highest Response Mixture of both has 36.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Neither.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.

The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response .
